column4: is it posable for me to update my ubuntu 5.10 to a better one im sure there is one
what is the system requerments coz i have a 512 ram and 2.6 cpu and 16 mb video card could i run daper?
yeah
yeah that is a good place to start
sudo apt-get install wine
that didnt work it said somthing like E: Package wine has no installation candidate

to add all the extra official repositories and install wine, make sure synaptic, update-manager, or any other package managers are closed, open a terminal (applications>accessories>terminal) and copy and paste the following all at once:
that command worked ummm now what im sorry
ok do you have a windows exe you want to run or what?
i can get one in about 5 secs
ok got it
what is it called and where is it located
awb41.exe and its on my desktop
ok do "wine ~/Desktop/awb41.exe", for future reference realize that the syntax is you do "wine" and then you put the path to the exe you are trying to run
that program i ran installed to c:\Active Worlds and it put Active Worlds.lnk on my desktop
ok...
how do i run it now coz i dont know where it installed it
open nautilus to the home folder and press "ctrl +h" then navigate to .wine/drive_c/ and then you should be able to click around until you find it
what is nautilus
what is the path to the exe
the file manager
ok i found the exe but how do i run it coz i dont know its path its at like home\.wine\drive_c\Active Wolds
but what is it called
wine ~/.wine/drive_c/Active\ Worlds/aworld.exe
